name: Dona Flor - Puro Blend Ruby - Robusto
additionalNotes: Dona Flor is a Brazilian premium cigar brand that pays tribute to the traditional craftsmanship and literary legacy of the country manufactured by Menéndez Amerino. Headquartered in Bahia, Brazil, Doña Flor stands out for her careful selection of tobaccos and meticulous production methods that result in high quality cigars. From the iconic Dona Flor Puro Mata Fina to a variety of blends that satisfy different tastes, each Dona Flor cigar is an invitation to enjoy excellence and distinction in each smoke.
